title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation in the eclipse jdt.ui3 plugin, the 'Select xxx' option is showing up as the destination. This behavior seems incorrect.
OB: When performing a 'copy package' operation in the eclipse jdt.ui3 plugin, the 'Select xxx' option is showing up as the destination.
EB: The expected behavior would be for the destination to show as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of 'Select xxx'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the eclipse jdt.ui3 plugin.
2. Perform a 'copy package' operation.
3. Observe that the destination is shown as 'Select xxx'.
4. The expected behavior is for the destination to show as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
